title: Hong Kong court finds Jimmy Lai guilty of national security crimes
snippets: Hong Kong's highest court has found Jimmy Lai guilty of sedition and conspiring to collude with foreign powers.
Advocates have described the verdict as an 'unlawful' decision based on 'trumped-up national security charges'.

Pro-democracy media tycoon Jimmy Lai was found guilty on charges of colluding with foreign forces and sedition under a Beijing-imposed national security law. The conviction means he could spend life in prison.
The business mogul and activist has been in ailing health and has already spent more than 1,800 days in solitary confinement in Hong Kong before his verdict.
The 78-year-old UK citizen was convicted of lobbying foreign governments to impose sanctions on HK and China.

title: Buffalo Bills and Chargers win important NFL games in Week 15
snippets: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Buffalo Bills poking fun at the New England Patriots after a huge road win.
Highlights of the Buffalo Bills against the New England Patriots from Week 15 of the NFL season.

Josh Allen out preformed Drake Maye in an AFC East battle, completing 19-of-28 passes and three touchdowns while adding 48 yards on the ground to help the Buffalo Bills beat the New England Patriots 35-31.
Justin Herbert picked up 210 passing yards and a touchdown while Cameron Dicker nailed three field goals to eliminate the Kansas City Chiefs from playoff contention with a 16-13 win.

Sam Darnold threw for 271 yards, Jaxon Smith-Njigba recorded 117 yards on seven catches and Jason Myers nailed a franchise-record six field goals to elevate the Seattle Seahawks to a 18-16 win over the Indianapolis Colts.
Brock Purdy threw for 295 yards and three touchdowns while Christian McCaffrey added 73 yards and a rushing score as the San Francisco 49ers downed the Tennessee Titans 37-24.

Trevor Lawrence dominated with 330 passing yards and five touchdowns while Travis Etienne Jr. ran for 78 yards and scored three touchdowns to lead the Jacksonville Jaguars to a 48-20 win over the New York Jets.
C.J. Stroud was great, completing 22-of-29 passes and three touchdowns, including two into the hands of Nico Collins as the Houston Texans beat the Arizona Cardinals 40-20.
Jacory Croskey-Merritt got 96 yards on 18 rushing attempts and a touchdown while Marcus Mariota threw 211 yards as the Washington Commanders beat the New York Giants 29-21.
